name: Flafari
description:
A fun day in the safari? Ahh not really

Professor Shezifi, Welcome to Flafari!

Thought it will be a fun activity to go on this sunny day to the safari and take some pictures of the cute animals? Well, you should have asked first because now they're angry...

Good luck surviving and try to not be eaten!

Controls:

[ space ] - for jumping 

---------------------------

Designer: Eylon Malkevich

Guidance : Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

 Art & Interaction course, Bezalel Academy of Art and design, 2022
